template_input_params.name: ip_address
template_input_params.label: IP Address of Virtual Machine
template_input_params.description: IP address of the virtual machine to clone repositories to

template_input_params.name: user
template_input_params.label: User Name
template_input_params.description: User name to access the virtual machine

template_input_params.name: user_password
template_input_params.label: User Password
template_input_params.description: User password to access the virtual machine

template_input_params.name: github_token
template_input_params.label: Github Access Token
template_input_params.description: Token used to access Github API to clone repositories
